sentences.english: Antenatal diagnosis is usually made after 22 weeks of gestation.
sentences.chinese: 通常在產前檢查時發現此腫瘤約爲懷孕22周以後。

sentences.english: Now we use a number of tests to target our efforts on those in high-risk groups.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們着力採用一些產前檢查來觀測高危產婦。

sentences.english: Needless to depression, What, then still to be recommended to the hospital antenatal check search.
sentences.chinese: 不用擔心，但是還是建議到醫院做個產前檢查。

sentences.english: So, mid-stream clean catch urinary culture are necessary in antepartum examination.
sentences.chinese: 因此，中段尿培養在產前檢查中實屬必要。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate relationship between prenatal examination and pregnancy outcomes of foreign migrant women in Shanghai city.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲了探討產前檢查與妊娠結局的關係。

sentences.english: Most pregnant women did not receive prenatal checkups and gave birth at home.
sentences.chinese: 大多數孕婦未做產前檢查，往往在家中分娩。

sentences.english: If there was a prenatal test for autism, would this be desirable?
sentences.chinese: 如果我們有一種自閉症的產前檢查，這是否是可欲的？

sentences.english: You can go to the hospital cards, and then periodically do prenatal check-up.
sentences.chinese: 你可以去醫院建卡了，然後定期去做產前檢查。
